actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income certain amounts of the military compensation of members of active or reserve components of the Armed Forces of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $1,000 per month of the compensation received by members of the armed forces.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income certain amounts of the military compensation of members of active or reserve components of the Armed Forces of the United States.
